page.title: 14Industry in the Maylands
page.content: There is a{small industrial estate which manufactures articles varying from kitchen units, double glazing, electronic drum kits, to a marine workshop, among others. Near the Promanade is a{boatyard}and a factory making drawing office equipment. A great many people are{self-employed including light engineering, repair work on cars and domestic equipment, processing and sale of pet foods and sales of garden or allotment produce. The marina generates some{casual work on boats. There is also a thriving nursery and garden centre. The rest of the area consists mainly of farmland. The is a garage and a few shops.
